title: Doomr.io
description: Doomr.io is a 3D post-apocalyptic shooter where survival is a relentless battle. After a devastating nuclear war, few human survivors remain. Mutants roam the desolate world, posing constant threats. Armed with powerful weapons and gear, you must fight through hordes of mutants in a constant struggle for survival. Only the strongest and most resourceful will endure in this unforgiving wasteland. You can hang out in safe zones to gear up, trade, and rest. Head to Survival Mode for PVE and to earn gear and items.
